content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Measuring your cabinets and identifying what you need to store is a great starting point. From there, you can start exploring different storage solutions and finding the perfect fit for your needs.

Adjustable shelves and baskets are a great way to customize your cabinet space and make the most of it. And, as you mentioned, a Lazy Susan and door organizer can be super helpful in maximizing your storage space.

Remember to also consider the style and aesthetic you want to achieve in your bathroom. You can find storage solutions that not only function well but also look great and fit with your bathroom's decor.

Labeling everything is also a great idea. It'll make it so much easier to find what you need when you need it, and it'll also help you maintain your newly organized space.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, have fun with your bathroom organization project, and I hope it turns out amazing!
